body.name: Vikiullf Nightstand for Bedroom - Wooden Night Stand, Bedside Table, Bedroom Nightstand with Drawers, Farmhouse Style Bedroom Furniture (Brown, 2-Drawer)
features: 【Classic Bedroom Nightstands】 -- Natural wood grain design add more elegant and classic to your bedroom.
【Storage Drawer】 -- Easily keeping the cups, glasses, magazines or phone at your hands. Smooth drawer can put your private things.
【Quality Wood Nightstand】 -- Made of quality wood and waterproof sticker, tasteless and safe, providing peace of mind during your sleep.
【Smooth Drawer Rail】 -- Metal handle is charming and smooth, slide rails are easy to pull in and out.
【Buy with Confidence】 -- All parts and tools are included in package. Please feel free to let us know if there is any problem or suggestion.
【 Great Gift】 -- Perfect for as gift to your frinends, family or parient at on Christmas, Thanksgiving, Father's Day or Mother's Day.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Add a classic decor cabinet to your room and free your life from messy and disorder. Set of 2 Vikiullf nightstands with 2 drawers are vintage and functional. Sturdy wood material and smooth wood grain sticker is perfect for keeping the cups. Glasses and magazines near at your hands.
As comfortable as spring and warm as autumn!
Material P2 Particle Board Wood and Metal Handle Product Dimensions 18.74”(L) x 15.63”(W) x 23.82”(H) Weight Capacity of Table 100 lbs Drawer Size 14.17”(L) x 12.24”(W) x 3.74”(H)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This side table/ nightstand was built very sturdy. The drawers are very roomy. Looks great. Love the side table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as described. Easy to assemble, very sturdy and the wood grain was just as I wanted. Perfect night stand!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The locknuts are garbage, Along with the “wood”, as you can see. Good luck getting a refund, it won’t happen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality, super smooth assembly
reviews.reviewText: This is a great nightstand. I was shocked at the heavy weight of the box when we received it. With the exception of the backing pieces, everything is sturdy. Technically the pieces are particle board but you'd never know by the weight or surface appearance. They are heavy like real wood and the surfaces have a wood grain texture. The backing pieces are thinner. I was absolutely amazed at how well the assembly process went. Usually when I put together a piece of furniture the drill holes don't line up correctly or some are missing etc. This was perfectly prepared for assembly. All the holes lined up 100% in the correct place. The boards and hardware matched up exactly how it was supposed to. Nothing was missing from the package. And the instructions were crystal clear. It was probably the least frustrating assembly I've ever done on a piece of furniture. I was really impressed. Start to finish it took me about 90 minutes. It's not difficult by any means, there are just a LOT of parts. I highly recommend using a ratcheting screwdriver rather than a regular one. It will save you a ton of time. There is one place on the piece that is slightly damaged as shown in the photo (underneath the table top there is a little wood showing through the paint). That is my only negative. Otherwise this is an excellent buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This nightstand is nice and easy to assemble with the included instructions. It looks fancy at an affordable price. It seems sturdy and durable because it is well made and of high quality. I love the shelf and drawer for convenient storage of my phone charger and other personal items. I highly recommend this nightstand as a gift for yourself or someone else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The hardware is impossible to use
reviews.reviewText: I've put a lot of furniture together over the years but I don't think I've ever struggled as much as I did with this nightstand. It uses a "quickfit" head screw and a cam lock, with instructions to neither over or under tighten the screw. That would be fine except the holes for the screws are sometimes too deep or too shallow and you have to be extremely careful to line up the screw correctly. The bigger challenge, however, was to get the cam-lock to actually lock down the screw. Mine were sliding in and out and once the cam has been inserted, it's impossible to remove it and try again. You also need to be an octopus - you have to hold at least 4 different panels in place simultaneously while trying to get the cam-lock into the best position. The entire thing collapsed onto itself, ripping the screws out of the panels, rendering it impossible to hold together. With no exaggeration, I've never yet assembled anything that has taken me more than an hour at the absolute most, but I finally called it quits after 5 hours of struggling to get everything to fit together. I find it interesting that the variation that I purchased no longer seems to be sold. Knowing there are many other options that take little effort to assemble, I'm going to call this a learning experience and stick to something I know I won't have to work so hard to assemble. It doesn't help that the instructions are all illustrations with no words to support the pictures. That might be fine if only a couple of things needed to be done in each step. But one illustration, for example, had 14 separate pieces of hardware that needed to be inserted/cam-locked. Often it was a challenge to determine which type of hardware went into which hole. I don't recommend this item for people who do not have experience assembling furniture. Even if you do have experience, there are multiple options on Amazon that are a lot easier to assemble, won't cost you more money, and look better when the job is finished. I really wanted this to work, hoping it would replace a nightstand damaged during a move. But this feels so fragile, I'm not sure it would withstand any future moves. I value my own time and hate to waste it on a project that is doomed to failure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice bedside table
reviews.reviewText: This is a heavy table it has a top cubby hole and 2 drawers. It was easy to assemble and looks really nice. I followed the assembly directions but the drawers go in about an inch to far so I have to try and fix that. It’s a very sturdy table and looks really nice except the drawers which is assembly error on my part.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful drawers. 2 drawers. Slides perfect and smooth. Glossy finish to the black. Very sturdy. I can tell this will last a very long time. I really love that this is big but not that big it fits perfectly in the corner without being in the way. Very easy to set up. Definitely came in handy as I needed some more storage.
